arts.ttl: Serie A Liveblog inc Atalanta vs. Bologna, Lazio vs. Roma, Fiorentina vs. Parma
Fiorentina and Parma on the hunt for three points
arts.sum: Fiorentina have won their last three league games at the Franchi without conceding a goal; the last time they achieved at least four consecutive wins while keeping a clean sheet in Serie A was between May and October 2015 (six in that case). After the 2-2 against Milan in the most recent match, Fiorentina could draw two consecutive league games for the first time since the first three matchdays of this season (the first of which was against Parma).

arts.ttl: Weston McKennie among 13 footballers probed for illegal gambling in Italy
arts.sum: Weston McKennie and 12 others are under investigation for illegal betting in Italy. The probe follows revelations from Sandro Tonali and Nicolò Fagioli, who faced bans for gambling. No evidence links others to match bets, but fines may follow for online poker use.
